name: Adrian Peterson Portrait, NFL, Minnesota Vikings, Running-Back
description:
Original Acrylics on Canvas Painting.  Finished in navy blue and white top-end wooden frame.  Sure to impress! 
Canvas Size: 14.5” x 17.5” with and 11” x 14” without the frame.

Adrian Peterson is an American football running back for the Minnesota Vikings of the National Football League.  Here are only a few of his accomplishments:

NFL awards
•	2007 AP NFL Offensive Rookie of the Year & Diet Pepsi NFL Rookie of the Year; 
•	2008 Pro Bowl, Pro Bowl MVP, Best Breakthrough Athlete ESPY Award, Rushing Title (1760 yards), First-Team All-Pro, and FedEx Ground Player of the Year. 
•	2009 Pro Bowl and First-Team All-Pro 
•	2010 Pro Bowl and First-Team All-Pro 
NFL records
•	Most 200-yard rushing games for a rookie (2) 
•	Most yards rushing in the first eight games (1,036) 
•	Most yards rushing in a single game (296) 
•	Second rookie ever to win Pro Bowl MVP (Marshall Faulk in 1994)

name: Oil on Canvas "Žemyna, Goddess of Life on Earth" 48in x 60in
